name: Lost worlds found history
description:
Little Cthulhu is on a fieldtrip to the Museum of Ruins where is shown artifacts which resembles several collapsed cilizations. Sadly some artifacts were lost and our character decided to find then on the Lost and Found area. Wandering throught the museum Little Cthulhu will solve puzzles to fix and organize the exposition.

Game made for the Global Game Jam 2021

CONTROLS
Move -> Arrow Keys
Action -> Space
